raw.title: Cycle Model Compiler User Guide
raw.content_description: Arm Cycle Models tools provide an integrated environment that places system validation in parallel with the hardware development flow. The Cycle Model Compiler takes an RTL hardware model and creates a high-performance linkable object, called the Cycle Model, that is cycle and register accurate. The Cycle Model provides an API for interfacing with your validation environment.

The Cycle Model Compiler takes an RTL hardware model and creates a high-performance linkable object, called the Cycle Model, that is cycle and register accurate. The Cycle Model provides an API for interfacing with your validation environment.
